synopsis.text: As an ordinary student, Sorao's life takes an extraordinary turn when he befriends two aliens stranded on Earth. Driven by a newfound sense of purpose, he embarks on a mission to help them return home. Upon reaching the alien homeworld, Sorao and his friend Miki find themselves entangled in a bitter feud between two tribes. The conflict intensifies as the tribes' representatives race to uncover a hidden treasure from the past, using a recently discovered clue. This thrilling adventure promises to keep viewers on the edge of their seats.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
